issue.title: [CI] Remove extra ubuntu-r-only-r service from docker-compose.yml
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13261](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13261). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once we support GCC 11, we should be able to use the standard `ubuntu-r` service without needing to have a separate `ubuntu-r-only-r` which overrides the command of `ubuntu-r`.
